entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor release version fine, published version fails #17116
  • [test] Add a test for the fix in #17023 #17115
  • [tests] Enable RefreshView device tests #17114
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border content should be centered like iOS when resizing #17111
  • [Windows] Border content is not correctly clipping and aligning #17109
  • Slower webview inside MAUI #17106
  • How to hide the password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #17105
  • RightToLeft in .NET MAUI is completely messed and not functioning the same on iOS and Android #17098
  • Issue in Grid column sizing #17097
  • RightToLeft in .NET MAUI is completely messed and not functioning the same on iOS and Android #17096
  • An error was encountered while registering a service worker js script in the MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #17095
  • Cannot connect to mac after updating to VS 17.7.3 #17089

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Border clips on the bottom and right #16667
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add Platform-specific properties for Drag and Drop Gesture Recognizer EventArgs #16992
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid rows not sizing properly on Windows #16857
    .NET 8 GA
  • Can't connect Visual Studio with Mac due to microsoft.net.sdk.ios.manifest v16.4.7098 missing from nuget.org #17077
  • Some images are not shown on Windows #17054
  • Delay in BackgroundColor update for Button in Release mode #17056
  • [regression/8.0] Android app crashes with an ANR on .NET 8 preview 6 #16418
    .NET 8 GA
  • Tapped event in TapGestureRecognizer is not raised up when add span dynamically #17113
  • [MAUI]Some pictures could not be loaded. #16851
    .NET 8 GA
  • Cannot add Mica backdrop to Maui Blazor hybrid app #16874
  • [regression/8.0.0] - RefreshView does not hide spinner when IsRefreshing set to false. #16910
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0-preview 4] Border with RoundRectangle Corner Radius values are smaller than they were #14936
    .NET 8 GA
  • RoundRectangle StrokeShape produces a different result on iOS vs Android #14276
    Under Consideration
  • Unable to click controls in a CarouselView in iOS #16867
  • Shell content navigation does not navigate to correct view #9765
    Backlog
  • Not found Microsoft.macOS.Sdk.Msi.x64 (13.3.7098) #17101
  • Pull to refresh on RefreshView does not hide the refresh indicator. #8926
    .NET 8 GA
  • Nightly Builds fail to compile #17040
    8.0-rc1
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc1] [Android] Removing ItemSource item in ListView causes crash #17028
    .NET 8 GA
  • FontImageSource blurry on IOS in button and imagebutton #14728
    .NET 8 GA
  • [RC1] - iOS FontImageSource in AppShell TabBar Pixelation #6043
    .NET 8 GA
  • ClickGestureRecognizer is not functional #16739
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Run the API diff against stable versions #17118
    8.0-rc1
  • Revert "Grid distribution fix" #17112
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] 2W bindings always apply #17110
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #17103
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update BindableObject API docs #17099
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Update VisualElement docs (#16754) #17094
    area/docs 📓, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #17093
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing

Merged

  • [WinUI] Fix borders not showing bottom and right side #17016
    .NET 8 GA
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Merge net8 to rc1 release #17107
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix RefreshView specificity on IsRefreshing #17062
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed Android RoundRectangle border logic #17087
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator and Refactor APIs #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.1 to 17.7.2 #17058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] MauiEmbedding extensions should use specified TApp type #17085
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #17086
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17100
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid distribution fix #17023
    community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr8] Add properties to disable implicit things #17064
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Controls] Move ITextInput and IFontElement to InputView #17036
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix-Issue-With-Refresh-Indicator-Not-Hiding #17080
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [net7.0] Windows - Fix default item min height in CollectionView (#12811) #17092
  • [net7.0] [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #17088
  • Fix UI drag & drop tests #17044
    area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Add some properties/globs back into the NuGet for older workloads #17091
  • [net8.0] Add some properties/globs back into the NuGet for older workloads #17090
  • [build] Try fix provisioning mono #17076
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert Factory Registration to fix ListView regression #17084
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Obsolete ClickGestureRecognizer #17081
    area/gestures

Updated

  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix single taps #16561
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1901.177 to 1.0.1938.49 #17059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Consolidate all the test handler construction #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, Under Consideration
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing, Under Consideration
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, Under Consideration
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
